subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Some offended.
author: Charles Gilbreath
full_text:

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I have worked in electronics for over 40 years.=C2=A0 I NEVER went to trade=
 school or college.=C2=A0 I taught myself because that's how bad I wanted t=
o learn.=C2=A0 At a very young age, I went to the library and read everythi=
ng I could find on electronics.=C2=A0 When I ran out of books, I became a h=
am radio operator.=C2=A0 I worked in the aerospace industry in an engineeri=
ng lab until 10 years ago, when the government made cuts.=C2=A0 I still get=
 paid for what I know.

My point is that if you want it bad enough, you can=
 do whatever you need to do to make it happen.=C2=A0 If Frank can't or won'=
t build it, from what I've seen, he is willing to provide all the informati=
on to do it yourself.=C2=A0 If you are not willing to put that type of effo=
rt into it, find something else to occupy your time and efforts.










=



--- On Fri, 5/21/10, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:

=
From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Some of=
fended.
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com, RTSC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, May=
 21, 2010, 6:02 PM







=C2=A0



  


    
      
      
      =C2=A0I g=
et requests for boxes, and I think some get offended that I don't just whip=
 out a box and throw it at them for "their research". Trouble is, there's t=
oo many whack jobs out there wanting to be the world's=C2=A0onlyest box exp=
ert, or the ones desperately grieving, or lately, religious nuts! 

=C2=A0
=
=C2=A0I've said it over and over and over and over and over and over--expec=
tation will create the voices you want to hear. If you are seeking Jesus, t=
hat is exactly what you are going to get and you'll swear it's God gospel f=
reaking truth, and the rest of us should bow down to you. I think y'all kno=
w who I'm talking about. 

=C2=A0
=C2=A0I am uncertain if one can ask for c=
ertain spirits, or if even that tends to create what one wans. I think mayb=
e it works the same as the above. I don't ask for any specific spirits/enti=
ties, I don't ask questions, I just let them talk and try not to influance =
it. If I have question, I might think it, and most of the time they'll answ=
er, wiht out me asking.=C2=A0 That could be just creating want I want to he=
ar as well--don't know.

=C2=A0
=C2=A0I don't have to be on these groups an=
d I don't have make=C2=A0 boxes, except for my=C2=A0own use. I think the me=
ssages are personal in nature, no one is going to hear it the same, and it'=
s about worthless as "evidence". We get enough that's shareable to show oth=
ers that it's real, and I think that is about the best that can be hoped fo=
r. I think, and it is only my opinion, that "evidence" at so called haunted=
 areas is just what is expected, I really don't think it=C2=A0proves anythi=
ng.

=C2=A0
=C2=A0Then, there the bullies that want all this to conform to =
their wishes, and we saw more examples of that with=C2=A0the recent e-bay a=
uction, and y'all know who you are! If no one sells boxes, no one builds bo=
xes, its' that simple! Parts and radios are not free, and why the hell shou=
ld we be expected to spend endless hours on this stuff for nothing!?

=C2=
=A0
=C2=A0I know, I know --sacrilege! -- I should be banned from all groups=
 and box work, burned at the stake, tarred and feathered, run out of town o=
n rail, how dare=C2=A0I say anything!?
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Frank S


    
     

 =
